eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: DepositRewards
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyRewardWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencySweepWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: EmergencyWithdraw
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: LogUpdatePool
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: This emits when ownership of a contract changes.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit HAIR token into the contract to earn rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of HAIR to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: getMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Return reward multiplier over the given _from to _to block.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pendingReward
functionDecorators.description: View function to see pending Reward on frontend.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardBalance
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the rewrad balance of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: setEndBlock
functionDecorators.description: Define last block on which reward distribution occurs.

parameterDecorators.name: _endBlock
parameterDecorators.description: The block when rewards will end.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardPerBlock
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of reward tokens to be given per block.

functionDecorators.name: sweepToken
functionDecorators.description: A public function to sweep accidental ERC20 transfers to this contract. Tokens are sent to owner.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the ERC20 token to sweep.

functionDecorators.name: totalHairTokenBalance
functionDecorators.description: Obtain the hair balance of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updatePool
functionDecorators.description: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw rewards and/or HAIR. Pass a 0 amount to withdraw only rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of HAIR to withdraw.
